doc.after: ESA is an intergovernmental organisation of 21 member states.[8] Member states participate to varying degrees in the mandatory (25% of total expenditures in 2008) and optional space programmes (75% of total expenditures in 2008).[9] The 2008 budget amounted to â¬3.0 billion the 2009 budget to â¬3.6 billion.[10] The total budget amounted to about â¬3.7 billion in 2010, â¬3.99 billion in 2011, â¬4.02 billion in 2012, â¬4.28 billion in 2013 and â¬4.10 billion in 2014.[3][11][12][13] Languages used are English, French, German, Italian, Dutch and Spanish.[2]
